verbose_text: p53, a transcription factor, is activated by ROS, and induces the upregulation of mitochondrial proapoptotic proteins including B-cell lymphoma-2-associated X protein (Bax) and members of the B-cell lymphoma-2-homology 3 (BH3) family consisting of BH3 interacting death agonist (Bid), Nox activator 1 (Noxa), and p53 upregulated modulator of apoptosis (PUMA) [XREF_BIBR].
